content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius regional district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the defendant was ordered to forfeit certain personal belongings and recognized their obligation to creditors the court also ordered the applicant to compensate the defendant the text discusses various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property and spousal liability obligations the applicant filed for divorce and made several claims while the defendant filed a counterclaim the court will decide on the division of property return of personal belongings and enforcement of creditors obligations the court approved the dissolution of the marriage due to fault and ordered the forfeiture of personal belongings the court also recognized an obligation in a bank credit agreement and ordered compensation to be paid both parties were ordered to pay unpaid stamp duties

metadata.cost: 21.00 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the defendant; 123.00 EUR (stamp duty)+ 100.00 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the plaintiff
